ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] just starting
ygData.msgSnippet: This is what I did.  Flameless lanterns until trivial, bow cams until trivial, and then a combination of stalking probes and spyglasses until trivial.
ygData.messageBody:
This is what I did. Flameless lanterns until trivial, bow cams until
trivial, and then a combination of stalking probes and spyglasses until
trivial. Spyglasses cost more to make than spyglasses, but become trivial
at a lower level. They also seem to be easier to sell. I'm now faced with
aqualungs, which don't become trivial for around 46 points I think. I
would guess if the thermal cloak was in the game, it would fit in between
stalking probes and aqualungs, maybe with a trivial point around 125 or
so. Anyway, at 210pp per attempt, I will be working lungs for quite some time.

Also, anyone on Bristlebane that can make rebreathers, a character named
Shale wants one. I'm too far away to make one for him.

Atiny

At 09:51 PM 3/16/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Daniel1013@...
>
>I just got my lvl 16 a week ago, what should I start tinkering first? All I
>need is to get my skill up high enough that I wont fail at cams. Any advice?
>
>
>-Wraiths of The Order of Dragonbane, Mith Marr
>
>-
